commentary: Speaking of the doomsday cult, here's its leader. And in a way, sort of the shadow leader of the troll session. She doesn't really act like a leader or see herself as one, though. She just floats around emotionlessly, setting stuff up, and lets predestination do the rest. Who the hell is she, anyway? We don't know yet, because this isn't even her intro. Just a snapshot tease, as Hivebent continues Hivebending. Is she some sort of... ghost? (¥es.) Guess we'll just (yes) have to wait and see! (She's a ghost.)
